website_summaries.verdict: For a super stylish design and all the reliability of the Under Armour brand, this shoe delivers.
pros: Adds a mid-sole support to the odor-fighting technology of the sole
A favorite of kids, it comes in several color schemes to appeal to girls and boys
cons: Slightly more expensive than other choices

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!  Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second pair of this shoe - same color, same style. His foot definitely runs toward a wider width so some of the Under Armour are just too narrow. The Scramjet fits him perfeclly and before this grey pair, he had a multi colored pair (same style and shoe). My son loves the fit and they have lasted until he was ready for another size or until they looked shabby and I thought he needed a refresh!!
customer_reviews.author: LLee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a great price.....
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. My son loves them. I said they fit somewhat small because he wears a 4 in Nike and we ordered a 4 in these and they were pretty tight on his foot. We returned them and ordered a 41/2 and they fit perfectly. They are holding up well to the daily shenanigans of a 9 year old little boy. I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone. I love Under Armour as a general rule, and the return and reorder was completely stress free and easy. I just handed the return to the UPS guy when he arrived with the new shoes 2 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Returned and purchased the exact pair in a 6 and they are great! He loves the bright green
customer_reviews.text: My son’s current pit of Nike shoes were a 4 so I ordered these in a 5 and they were almost too small. His toe was at the end. Returned and purchased the exact pair in a 6 and they are great! He loves the bright green. They don’t seem to have much cushion though so if your kiddo has a high arch they may not work.
customer_reviews.author: luckymama

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my oldest for Christmas and he really likes them. There’s not a lot of arch support, but he says they’re comfortable and they really nice.
customer_reviews.author: AshleeC3

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes! Colors are so bright and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes bought for my son, so well made. The colors are bright and stand out. They are sturdy and will hold up well. He’s 11 and thinks they are great. They fit well and he says they feel like they are made for his foot.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey knox

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this style I purchased for my son. He likes them for running.
customer_reviews.author: PAMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves them! The colors are really neat and they're very light-weight.
customer_reviews.author: andrea pletcher barton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Fits as expected. My 10 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new just as in the add! Amazing ! Thank u!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers look expensive and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves anything Under Armor. He really likes these shoes. These sneakers look expensive and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for an active boy
customer_reviews.text: Under Amour shoes are always true to fit and do not fall apart. Plus, I can throw them into the washing machine and they come out looking brand new. Great product and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Enright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as shown and my son loves them
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY BARNETT

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my 10 year old son. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 year old son. He absolutely loves them. The color, the fit, the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader07

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright color
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, great shoe with bright colors like my son likes to move faster!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Size 5 fit my 10 year old son just right ...
customer_reviews.text: Size 5 fit my 10 year old son just right with a little room to grow. He loves them and they seem to be very durable. He wears them nearly every day!
customer_reviews.author: ATLmom

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old LOVES his new shoes! they fit perfectly and the green is bright and easy to clean which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Neeners503

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good
customer_reviews.text: Great, fun shoes. The kids at school tell my son that they like his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are nice, not as comfortable as memory foam shoes but cool look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now have a disappointed young man
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift from r Christmas the lacing broke. I contacted Amazon but they never returnrd a reply. Now have a disappointed young man, very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Kids' Grade School X Level Scramjet Remix Athletic Shoe
product_meta.description: Soft, 3D printed mesh upper provides locked-in midfoot support & lightweight breathability. Anti-odor technology applied to footbed to prevent the growth of odor-causing microbes. Full-length EVA midsole features Charged Cushioning under the heel that absorbs impact & converts it into a responsive burst of energy. UA HeroFlex sole construction provides extra flexibility to help your foot you move smoothly in every direction. Strategically placed rubber traction pods under the heel & forefoot areas of the outsole deliver greater traction & durability.
feature_bullets: Soft, 3D printed mesh upper provides locked in midfoot support & lightweight breathability
Anti odor technology applied to footbed to prevent the growth of odor causing microbes
Full length EVA midsole features Charged Cushioning under the heel that absorbs impact & converts it into a responsive burst of energy
UA HeroFlex sole construction provides extra flexibility to help your foot you move smoothly in every direction
